overview: In one of the most inhospitable places on Earth , Antarctica, a daring team of explorers and scientists leads to the absolute limits of the technology available and the same common sense . They immersed in water that has far surpassed the limits of freezing for mankind , explore under huge masses of ice and reach the most remote places where the hope of a emergency rescue is almost a fairy tale and everything to gain this race against time to be the first humans to document the largest iceberg in history.
title: Ice Island
